alt.description: Alt text when an image can't be displayed
alt.description_zh: 图像无法显示时的替代文本

:gap.description: The character type is a pixel from the left and right boundaries
:gap.description_zh: 字符类型距离左右两侧边界单位像素

:icon.description: Set a custom icon for your avatar
:icon.description_zh: 设置头像的自定义图标

shape.description: Specify the shape of the avatar

size.type: number / large / small / default / { xs: number, sm: number, ...}
size.description: Set the size of your avatar

src.description: The resource address or image element of the image avatar
src.description_zh: 图片类头像的资源地址或者图片元素

srcSet.description: Set the responsive resource address of the image avatar
srcSet.description_zh: 设置图片类头像响应式资源地址

draggable.description: Whether the image is allowed to be dragged

events.name: onError
events.description: If the image fails to load, returning false will turn off the default fallback behavior of the component
events.description_zh: 图片加载失败的事件，返回 false 会关闭组件默认的 fallback 行为
